    • Uses of Request in taxi.resource

      getRequest method This method is used for getting a Request object from a RequestHandlingInfo object

    • Uses of Request in taxi.service

      Methods in taxi.service that return Request 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Request RequestHandlingService.startRequest(Taxi taxi, Customer customer)
      startRequest method This method gets as parameters: the taxi object selected by the customer for this request and the customer object The method: Uses the current date as the date that the request was made Creates a request with that date, the taxi and the customer and inserts it to the DB Fetches from the table TaxiDriver the taxi driver to whom the given taxi belongs Informs taxi driver for this request The created request is returned
      Methods in taxi.service with parameters of type Request 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean RequestHandlingService.cancelRequest(Customer customer, Request req)
      cancelRequest method This method gets as parameters: the request object made by the customer and the customer object which cancels the request The method: Assumes that customer can only cancel a request he already made and it is not already canceled or done Updates the status of request to CANCELED Informs taxi driver that the request has been canceled
      Route RequestHandlingService.createRoute(Request req, java.lang.String fromAddress, java.lang.String toAddress, java.lang.String fromCity, java.lang.String toCity, int fromZipCode, int toZipCode)
      createRoute method This method gets as parameters: the request object made by the customer, the origin address, the origin city, the origin zip code, the destination address, the destination city and the destination zip code This method creates a route with information given by the customer.
      boolean RequestHandlingService.handleRequest(Request req, Taxi taxi, java.lang.String decision)
      handleRequest method This method gets as parameters: the request object made by the customer, the Taxi object with which the request is connected and the decision of the taxi driver (whether he will undertake this request or not) The method: In case the decision is 'yes": The status of the request is updated from pending to ongoing (in case it is not already canceled by the customer) The status of the taxi is updated from true (available) to false (booked) The customer is informed that his request was accepted In case the decision is "no": The status of the request is updated from pending to canceled The customer is informed that his request was denied The method returns true in case the request was accepted or false in case it was denied or any error occurred
      boolean RequestHandlingService.stopRequest(Request req, Taxi taxi, float cost, int duration)
      stopRequest method This method gets as parameters: the request object made by the customer, the taxi object which handled the request, the cost of the route and the duration of the route The method: Is called when the route has finished It changes the status of the taxi from false (booked) to true (free) It updates the status of the request to done It updates the cost and the duration of the route (got from within the request object) It calculates the commission for this route And finally the customer is informed about the final cost and is asked to evaluate the service Returns true in case everything went ok
